remark.ch: 電機三、四年級可選修，與CO3007通訊原理Ｉ合班授課

goal.ch: 了解類比通訊系統的調變與解調變，和雜訊及干擾對其所造成的影響。
goal.en: "To understand modulation and demodulation of analog communication systems, and the effect of noise and interferences."

outline.ch:
"週次 內容 備註
1 介紹、訊號模型及分類
2 傅立葉級數和傅立葉轉換
3 傅立葉轉換和功率頻譜密度
4 訊號和線性系統
5 取樣理論和雙邊帶調變
6 振幅調變和單邊帶調變
7 希爾伯特轉換和殘邊帶調變
8 線性調變之干擾和脈衝調變
9 期中考
10 角度調變訊號之調變
11 角度調變訊號之解調變
12 角度調變之干擾
13 隨機程序
14 隨機程序和線性系統
15 線性調變之雜訊
16 角度調變之雜訊
17 線碼、符元間干擾和等化
18 期末考"
outline.en:
"週次 內容 備註
1 Introduction, Signal Models and Signal Classifications
2 Fourier Sereies and Fourier Transform
3 Fourier Transform and PSD
4 Signal and Linear Systems
5 Sampling Theory and DSB
6 AM and SSB
7 Hilbert Transform and VSB
8 Pulse Modulation and Interference in Linear Modulation
9 Midterm Exam.
10 Modulation of Angle-Modulated Signals
11 Demodulation of Angle-Modulated Signals
12 Interference in Angle Modulation
13 Random Processes
14 Random Processes and Linear Systems
15 Noise in Linear Modulation
16 Noise in Angle Modulation
17 Line Codes, ISI and Equalization
18 Final Exam."

textbook.ch:
"教科書(英文)：Principles of Communications: Systems, Modulation, and Noise, 7th edition,  R. E. Ziemer and W. H. Tranter, John Wiley &Sons, Inc., 2014
參考書(英文)：Communication Systems, 4th edition, Simon Haykin, John Wiley &Sons, Inc., 2001"
